name: Dear Cousin
description:
A short collectathon with a nice area to explore and some dialogue. It will probably take 10-15 minutes to get thru. Watch the trailer to hear the inspiration behind the story.

Move with WASD/arrows. Reset camera with mouse click/left ctrl

This is my first 3d game. It was meant to be made in a weekend just to get used to unity and playmaker, so adjust your expectations accordingly.

https://twitter.com/goonsquat did the audio. on soundcloud too https://soundcloud.com/slimerfromghostbusters

The bubbling sfx is from http://soundbible.com/51-Bubbling-Cauldron.html . I slowed and pitched it down.
